DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
--- Actualizacion de la tabla D_DIAGNOSTICO con marca de diagnostico severo
update D_DIAGNOSTICO set id_marca_severo = t.id_marca_severo, de_diagnostico = T.de_diagnostico FROM D_DIAGNOSTICO D INNER JOIN AUX_D_DIAGNOSTICO T ON (d.id_diagnostico = t.id_diagnostico)
update D_DIAGNOSTICO set id_marca_severo = 'N' where id_marca_severo = ' '

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1
Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource: Insert Into AUX_D_DIAGNOSTICO (id_diagnostico, de_diagnostico, id_marca_severo) select T65COD, RTRIM(T65DES), RTRIM(T65PAT) from [HOST03].[HOST03].[SMPORDD].[T65FDIA]
